definition: cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane

sentences.english: Four fixed rings need to be added on upper deck for derrick holds.
sentences.chinese: 吊货舱上层甲板上应装4个固定环。

sentences.english: If the cargo space ought to be reserved, please send us the necessary application forms.
sentences.chinese: 假如要预订货舱，请将订舱表寄给咱们。

sentences.english: Sounding the tanks and cargo hold bilges adjacent to collision area.
sentences.chinese: 测量碰撞附近的舱柜和货舱污水阱。

sentences.english: Whether you want to hear it or not, you could be allergic to your house-hold pet.
sentences.chinese: 不论你要听与否，你可以到您家过敏货舱宠物。

sentences.english: The aim of the derrick latched onto the cotton bales and lifted them into the hold.
sentences.chinese: 起重机吊臂抓住棉花包，把它们吊进货舱。

sentences.english: PSCO: Do all the cylinders protect the engine room and cargo holds?
sentences.chinese: 所有气瓶是保护机舱和货舱的吗？

sentences.english: What was it like day after day in their fetid cargo bay?
sentences.chinese: 在恶臭熏天的货舱中日复一日的生活是什么样的？

sentences.english: Are all cargo and bunker tank lids closed?
sentences.chinese: 所有液货舱舱口盖均已关闭？

sentences.english: The conclusions were of guiding significance to the design of Type-C liquid tank.
sentences.chinese: 这些结论对C型液货舱的设计具有一定的指导意义。

sentences.english: If the cargo space must be reserved， please send us the necessary application forms.
sentences.chinese: 如果要预订货舱，请将订舱表寄给我们。

sentences.english: Are fork-lift trucks for cargo holds available?
sentences.chinese: 可以提供货舱内工作的叉车吗？

sentences.english: Fire alarm displays of holds operational in 10minutes.
sentences.chinese: 货舱的火警显示10分钟后工作。

sentences.english: Inspecting fitting accuracy of hatch coaming on board.
sentences.chinese: 货舱口围板船上安装精度检查。

sentences.english: The hold was flooded, and the sailors were pumping out the water.
sentences.chinese: 货舱积了水，水手们在往外抽水。

sentences.english: The crane lifted the bales into the hold.
sentences.chinese: 起重机将大包吊进货舱。

definition: cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane
variant of 車廂|车厢[che1 xiang1]
the rear (tail) of a plane etc
